php-file-creator.submenus.main.label: Create PHP File
php-file-creator.config.useStrictTypeInT: Controls whether `declare(strict_types=1);` is included in generated files
php-file-creator.config.useFallbackNames: Use a fallback namespace when no namespace could be resolved
php-file-creator.config.fallbackNamespac: Define the namespace to use when the fallback namespace is enabled
The namespace must be a valid PHP namespace
